Reviews.Author: Meister Coolfresh
Reviews.Content: Do not fall for other sellers on amazon selling Afunta Q88. I got scammed. The unit I got from Onebook US is the best. The one I got from Afunta-mall was not Q88. It was garbage. If you really want this awesome tablet google A23 android 4.2.2 tablet.The one I love is:build number q88 4.2.2model number q88ALL OTHER AFUNTA Q88 on AMAZON ARE GARBAGE.I got lucky and scored one from Onebook USStay away from Afunta-mallremember google A23 android 4.2.2 tablet
Reviews.Title: Awesome. Super fast

Reviews.Author: Math Man
Reviews.Content: Great for handling my music, my videos, and my ebooks. Not fabulous for serious web browsing but gives me the weather and other things I need when I am out and about or traveling. Easier than packing a sony walkman or a paperback book (anyone out there remember them, I mean other than from history classes) One suggestion, consider buying a supplementary battery pack to plug into it.  they are cheep and it keeps you going longer.
Reviews.Title: Handy little entertainment center.

Reviews.Author: liliana
Reviews.Content: battery dies to soon and take forever to charge, also it takes to long to turn on I hope I could have got something better
Reviews.Title: It kinda sucks

Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I got the for Christmas. I use it for school and as a multimedia device. I wish the battery life was longer but its worth the money. some apps run slow and the camera is only .3 but in overall its great. better than a children's tablet from toys r us.
Reviews.Title: Worth it!

Reviews.Author: avery
Reviews.Content: Not fast at all....locks up and has trouble starting when powering on.Bought it for my dad to view pictures with......
Reviews.Title: 7 tablet...

Reviews.Author: Shaun
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the money.  Great for kids.  Just wish the volume was louder and the clarity was clearer.  Great buy tho.
Reviews.Title: great buy
